name: Eldritch Heritage, Mythic

sections.body: You gain sorcerer bloodline powers of the bloodline tied to Eldritch Heritage as if your sorcerer level were your character level – 2. For that bloodline's 1st-level bloodline power, use your full character level to determine its effect; for all other bloodline powers, treat your sorcerer level as your character level – 2.
sections.name: Benefits

description: The blood of your sorcerous ancestor mingles with your mythic power to great effect.
